title: Doppelganger
description: Find the closest tile that matches the selected tile and switch its position with the closest selectable tile that does not have an available match.

title: Oggo Poggo
description: Rare Items Appear More Often In the Shop

title: Nessie
description: Uncommon Items Appear More Often In the Shop

title: Bigfoot
description: Epic Items Appear More Often In the Shop

title: Lycanthrope
description:
Switch positions of all Sun and Moon tarot tiles.
Matching a Moon tiles increases Combo Level by 1.

title: Golem
description:
Reduces the target score each round by 200, but reduces leftover score added to wallet by 25%.
Wheel of Fortune tiles have a 1 in 12 chance of doubling your total score when matched.

title: Vampyre
description:
When active, drains 10% of the wallet per exposed Sun Tiles at the start of the round.
All scoring is multiplied by number of exposed Moon Tiles.
If the wallet amount is too small to drain, this card is consumed.

title: Dragon
description:
The more money you have in your wallet the higher the base score.
Half the amount in wallet at start of the round.

title: Leprechaun
description: Greatly increase your take each round.

title: Chupacabra
description:
When active, drains 20% of the wallet at the start of the round.
All scoring is doubled.
If the wallet amount is too small to drain, this card is consumed.

title: Troll
description: Move the current selected tile to the bottom of its stack.

title: Banshee
description: Increases the target score. All Death Tarot Tiles are placed in selectable positions at the start of the round.

title: Djinn
description: Use to double the money in your wallet. If you fail to reach the next target score, your wallet is emptied instead of ending the game. Djinn loses a charge either way. When all charges are used, the item is removed.

title: Dullahan
description: Moves all tiles at the highest Z positions to the closest selectable position with support. Tiles cannot be suspended in the air and must not have a tile directly beside them.

title: Arachne
description: Swap the 4 outer corner piles with their inner counterparts.

title: Wendigo
description: At start of round: lose 1 charge. Halves cooldowns and charges of other items. At end of round: destroy the item to the right; if destroyed, gain 1 charge.
